TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. The fish dish served by Trish happens to be an improperly cooked puffer fish. Uh oh.

I wish that I won't be ninja'd.

Granted, but you ninja yourself.

I wish for a non-corruptable corruptable wish.

Granted. You are corrupted.

I wish I could talk in duotronic algorithms. That'd be awesome! I don't care if anyone understands me.

Granted. Your computer hears you talking and accidentally installs a bunch of adware.

I wish for a pointy sphere.

Granted, but you step on it, and it causes you to get a high medical bill.

I wish for the original Kerbal SpacePort to be back.

Granted, but all of the mods on curse no longer exist.

I wish for a coupon.

Granted, but you got it on sale.

I wish for Pathmark.

Granted, a Pathmark store appears right above your head before crashing down and obliterating your body

I wish for Reality to be more like what's on TV

Granted. You live in 2 dimensions now.

I wish my mining operation wouldn't take 13 days or longer.

Granted, all ore is removed so there's no longer anything to mine.

I wish someone could explain how, if the fourth dimension is time, what dimension an animated cartoon is in

Granted, but it's so complicated that you can't even count to 2.

I wish for someone to get rid of something or someone who isn't myself.

Sorry, everything stays that is or isn't bolted or nailed down.

I wish that Astrofox would change his name to Terrafox.

DENIED! I shall always remain as my internet "allias" Astrofox - heck I might even make it my middle name!

I wish that Unity 5 was backwards compatible.

Granted, you now learn that "backwards compatible" is a euphemism for "buggy, sloppy, and has code back from 1980's that isn't doing anything except causing memory leaks"

I wish C# was never created

Granted, but then KSP doesn't exist, so this forum doesn't exist, so you didn't make the post.

I wish for a point in killing Jeb.

Granted. Your rockets all have nosecones.

I wish me and Jayden could go to Pluto. We have ambient protection against the space around us, as well as temperature. We can also move at warp speed, please.

Granted, but you run out of snacks.

I wish this thread didn't exist.

Granted. You now lost 53 posts from your post count, and is not known by anyone in this forum.

I wish for negative light.

Granted, but your eyes can't see it.

I wish I was famous.

Granted. You are famous. So famous in fact, that you can't even shower without crowds everywhere.

I wish for a few pop tarts. I'm hungry!

Granted, but they are stale and definitely not your favorite - they're your least favorite.

I wish food wouldn't expire unless eaten.

Granted. The food now expires in you, giving you horrible food poisoning constantly.

I wish i was a Russian

Granted. You are Soviet Russian and you're also in a Gulag.

I wish for a book of matches.

Granted. A modified year book.

I wish for a mountain of Pepsi to come down on me right now. I don't care if I die.

Granted, but you don't die. However, your butt-cheeks and various other bits are hopelessly stuck together when it dries.

I wish I could get that image out of my head.
